thread.title: Clive Underwood
thread.title_full: Official Car Mats reviewed by Clive Underwood

author: Clive Underwood
title: Clive Underwood
text:
After placing the order I realise I had made a mistake, contacted Official car mats and the telephone was answered by a lady called Becky who was very professional and very reassuring. When the matts arrived I was surprised at the quality of them, the design was spot on and they fitted the car perfectly. I would highly recommend this company.
Thank you to all the staff for there time and hard work
